QuestData.Title: Unsafe Workplace
QuestData.Description: You've returned just in time! Fae are in danger!$b$bIt seems our actions have enraged the gorm. They are even more aggressive than they were before!$b$bWhile some fae were able to evacuate, there are still many who are trapped down there.$b$bTake this jar and slather anyone you find with a generous helping. That should heal their wounds and give them a chance to escape.
QuestData.LogDescription: Heal $1oa wounded sylvar in the Banks of Life.
